title: Ana de Armas | The Great British Send-Off
description:
Queen Elizabeth II’s funeral was held today and her beloved dogs were present at the procession. Elsewhere, we learned more details about the despicable lies Florida’s governor used to trick migrants onto a plane bound for Martha’s Vineyard. Ana de Armas talks about the work she did to portray public figure Marilyn Monroe, as well as private citizen Norma Jean, in her new film, “Blonde.” Check out the film in select theaters now and premiering on Netflix on September 28th.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
